fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Platform>XHR>File download, I repeatedly pressed the "Large File Download" button. The progress bar alternates displaying the progress of the various streams. If you initiate enough downloads, the app may crash. 

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on a mobile device
2) Navigate to KitchenSink, Platform>XHR>File download
3) Repeatedly press the "Large File Download" button

Result:
Multiple downloads begin, the progress bar alternates showing status for each. Possible crash.

Expected Result:
Single download, no crash

Notes:
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Platform > XHR > File download, repeatedly pressing "Large File Download" results in multiple downloads starting and eventual crash
fields.environment: Android Eris (2.1), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105241943, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r294b6aa5

comments.body:
also occurs on:
Appcelerator Studio: , build: 3.1.2.201308091728
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.2.v20130809141556
CLI: 3.1.2-alpha
Alloy: 1.2.0-alpha6
Devices:
Nexus4 Android version 4.3
Nexus7(2) Android version 4.3
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
